physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bowing of the legs, prominent forehead with craniotabes, rachitic rosary, genu varus, enlargement of the wrists and ankles.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved after treatment with high doses of ergocalciferol and subsequent treatment with 1 /H9251-OHD.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Kyphosis, prominent rachitic rosary, widely open anterior fontanel, varus deformity of the elbow, severe rickets with fibulae fractures.
Prominent forehead, rachitic rosary, bowing of the legs.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Normalization of clinical, radiographic, and laboratory abnormalities after treatment with 1 /H9251-OHD.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Rachitic rosary, prominent forehead, enlargement of wrists and ankles.
Severe malnutrition, hypotonia, respiratory distress; findings consistent with severe rickets and pneumonia with pleural effusion.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Developed bilateral pneumothoraces and multiple organ failure, resulting in death.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Rachitic rosary, genu varus, fractures of the midregion of both ulnae, left tibia, and femur.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially treated with sodium citrate, citric acid, phosphate supplements, and calcitriol with good response; nephrocalcinosis noted after 8 months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe rickets on x-rays; hypocalcemia, high serum alkaline phosphatase and PTH concentrations.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Clinical, radiographic, and laboratory abnormalities normalized with calcitriol treatment.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Clinical signs of rickets; serum calcium low, 1,25(OH)2D not detectable.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Responded well to treatment with calcitriol.
